content:
Hey there.

I tried to find an answer in the repo, but it doesn't seem to be mentioned anywhere.
What's the motivation behind merging Cranelift into the wasmtime repository?

Is Cranelift not aiming to be a general purpose code generator anymore, but a wasm focused project?

https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/issues/1185#issuecomment-591050388

Tracking issue for merging the cranelift and wasmtime repositories 路 Issue #1185 路 bytecodealliance/wasmtime
Discussed at yesterday's meeting I wanted to open an issue tracking progress for merging the wasmtime/cranelift repositories. I think there are three major work items that need to happen: Perfo...
